package.name: pod2_navigation
package.description: pod2_navigation package is built on top of the NAV2 stack for ROS2. This consist of configuration file for various sub-packages ; planner server controller_servr, bt_navigator, behaviour_server, nav2_waypoint_follower, costmaps2D, AMCL. These parameters has been tuned for the specific PodCar NAV2 setup. The package also provides the localization using slam_toolbox in asynchronous mode. The parameter file has been referenced from the official slam_toolbox guide.
